transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Is this Rajiv Srivastava from M Matrix Pharmaceuticals?

Customer: Aap kaun?

Executive: Main Rukhsar baat kar rahi hun senior manager IndiaMART se.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Haan sir bataiye.

Executive: Ek aapka concern ek haan aapki subah baat hui aapke account manager se.

Customer: Manish se hai na kuch puch rahe the aap unse wo AI se related to unhone aapko assist nahi kiya tha pura?

Customer: Assist jo jis tarah ka assist jis type se assist kar rahe hain wo.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Haan wo wohi wohi wohi problem hai jo main pichle 12 saal se dekh raha hun IndiaMART mein.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Haan to uske baat baar baar karne se kya fayda hoga har bari aap log kehte hain ki main phone hi pick nahi karta.

Customer: Aapka phone to maine pick kiya na iske pehle bhi phone maine pick kiya tha.

Executive: Nahi aapse to kabhi nahi kaha humne ki aapne call pick up nahi kiya apna.

Customer: Nahi aap aapne aap pehli baar baat kar rahi hain aapki team ke log barabar yhi ke bolte hain ki aap phone nahi pick karte hain.

Executive: Haan wo to sir correct karte hain kyunki yahan par main dekh rahi hun call pick up nahi hota hai jo aapke pass buyers ke calls ja rahe hain 936 ye nine

Executive: 36 wala jo number hai usse calls aate hain buyers ke.

Customer: Haan ek bhi nahi aaya hai aap aap main kahiye to main call.

Executive: Sir aisa ho sakta hai ki aapne wo number hamara wo number jo hai aapne block list mein dala ho.

Customer: Block list mein bata dijiye main dekh lun.

Executive: Ek second aapko batati hun.

Executive: Line par.

Executive: Haan aapko jo calls aate honge wo number hai 7942554266.

Customer: Ye mera number to nahi hai.

Executive: Aap check kar nahi hum to direct aapka number promote nahi karte na hum aapko PNS number dete hain na.

Executive: Agar kisi buyer ko call karni hogi wo is ek number humne aapki profile mein de rakha hai us number pe call karenge fir wo call aapke pass land hogi to aapke pass direct buyer ka call nahi aayega.

Customer: Lekin call aayega to wo yahan se.

Executive: Aap check karenge aapko jo calls aati hain wo aati hain 7942554266 wale number se ek baar ye number zara dial kariye apne pass aapko dikhega ye block list par aapne block list mein dala hua hai.

Customer: Achcha dekhta hun main.

Executive: Haan main call pe hi hun check kariye aap ek minute zara hmm.

Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Haan ek baar number batayiyega.

Executive: Haan 79

Customer: 79

Executive: 42

Customer: 42

Executive: 55

Customer: 55

Executive: 4266

Customer: 4266 haan.

Customer: Block hai ye number?

Customer: The person you are speaking with

Customer: Block list mein to nahi hai ye maine dekh liya.

Executive: Sir agar aap dial karenge to kaise hoga aap aap kisi dusre number mein aap apna number thodi dial kar sakte hain ye to aapka number hai na.

Customer: Nahi maine ye number 794255 wala dial kiya hai.

Executive: Haan main samajh gayi jo number maine abhi aapko bataya hai wo wala number dial kiya hai na aapne.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Wo to number aapko diya hai na humne wo number aap kaise dial kar sakte hain matlab aap apna number thodi khud se dial kar sakte hain.

Customer: To kahan se aapko dikh raha hai ki maine block kiya hua hai main.

Executive: Sir dekhiye agar aap keh rahe hain agar aap keh rahe hain ki aapko calls nahi aa rahi hain to yakin ye number block list mein hoga aap apni ek baar block list check kijiye wo jo calls ki block list hoti hai aap apne call is number se call back karun aapko minute do minute aap pehle to aap na ye wala number save kariye 7942554266 apne phone mein likhiye is pe IndiaMART buyer.

Executive: Pehle aap is number ko save kariye IndiaMART buyer ke naam se aur fir jab aap save kar lenge isko fir aap apne phone ki block list open karega ye IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save hai haan.

Executive: To ab aap jo call log hoti hai na jo calls wala block list hota hai aap usko open kariye ye number aapko pakka wahin milega.

Customer: Block list mein haan haan bilkul dekh lijiye aap do minute baad call back kariye main dikhata hun aapko.

Executive: Theek hai main meeting schedule karun fir aapke sath mein haan do minute baad theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Customer says IndiaMART team says he doesn't pick up.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and call pickup not happening.

- Executive said the customer may have blocked the number.

- Executive provided the number to check in blocklist.

- Customer confirmed the number was in the blocklist.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a meeting with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, blocklist, calls

seller_categories.mcat_name: Polyethylene glycol and Propylene Glycol Eye Drop
